edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.poker

Class Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<Card>
          • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.poker.Hand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Card>, Collection<Card>, List<Card>, RandomAccess

    public class Hand
extends ArrayList<Card>
implements Serializable
    Class that represents a hand of 2 Cards. The ONLY object that should have a Hand object is Player
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
